sentences.en: Every man had his own task to do and did It'superbly.
sentences.cn: 人人各司其职,成绩斐然.

sentences.en: I have, however, seen a superbly majestic and beautiful sunrise.
sentences.cn: 但是, 我却看到了一次最雄伟、最瑰丽的日出景象.

sentences.en: I thought he did Hamlet superbly.
sentences.cn: 我觉得他扮演哈姆雷特一角很出色.

sentences.en: Lewis's eye for this kind of thing is superbly exact.
sentences.cn: 刘易斯对这种事的观察极为精确.

sentences.en: My lens is surrounded by a ring of ting , superbly strong, unbelievably hard - working muscles.
sentences.cn: 我的晶体周围有一圈特别强壮, 且令人难以置信的勤奋工作着的小肌肉.

sentences.en: My section at the Admiralty Research Laboratory was run superbly by Stephen Butterworth.
sentences.cn: 我所在的海军部研究实验室的那个组由斯蒂芬?巴特沃思出色的领导着.

sentences.en: Navy, he said, had performed superbly.
sentences.cn: 他说海军表现得非常出色.

sentences.en: The action scenes were fantastic. The special effects were superbly done.
sentences.cn: 动作画面非常精彩, 特效做得非常好.

sentences.en: The car is superbly engineered and a pleasure to drive.
sentences.cn: 这辆车设计一流,开起来是一种享受.

sentences.en: The dinner was often a riotous affair enlivened by superbly witty speeches.
sentences.cn: 宴会常常会因为一些非常诙谐的讲话而气氛活跃，热闹非凡。
这支管弦乐队演奏得棒极了。

sentences.en: The sports complex is huge and superbly well-equipped.
sentences.cn: 这个综合体育馆规模巨大，设备一流。

sentences.en: This new jet engine is superbly engineered.
sentences.cn: 这个新喷气式发动机的设计实属上乘.

sentences.en: This root of red - rooted salvia is a superbly chosen medicinal material.
sentences.cn: 这根丹参是精选出的上好药材.

sentences.en: Turner, however, putted superbly, twice holing from 40 feet.
sentences.cn: 然而特纳两次从40英尺处漂亮地将球轻击入洞。

words.tran_cn: 雄伟地；壮丽地；上等地；庄重地

trans.tran_cn: 庄重地，华美地，极好地，上等地
